query.title: Scheme-wise customer payment of current year
query.content: SELECT COUNT(CUSTOMER_ID) AS CUSTOMERS , SCHEME_ID FROM ltr_trn_summary WHERE YEAR(CURRENT_DATE)=YEAR(START_DATE) AND STATUS='NORMAL' GROUP BY SCHEME_ID

query.title: Week-wise customer payment of current year
query.content: SELECT COUNT(CUSTOMER_ID) AS CUSTOMERS, START_DATE FROM ltr_trn_summary WHERE WEEK(current_date)=WEEK(START_DATE) AND STATUS='NORMAL' GROUP BY START_DATE

query.title: Payment and Receipt In Different Types
query.content: SELECT IFNULL(PAYMENT_TYPE,RECEIPT_TYPE) AS PAYMENT_RECEIPT_TYPE , IF(PAYMENT_TOTAL=0,RECEIPT_TOTAL,PAYMENT_TOTAL) AS PAYMENT_RECEIPT_TOTAL FROM ( SELECT PAYMENT_TYPE AS PAYMENT_TYPE , SUM(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) AS PAYMENT_TOTAL , RECEIPT_TYPE AS RECEIPT_TYPE , SUM(RECEIPT_AMOUNT) AS RECEIPT_TOTAL FROM ltr_trn_details WHERE STATUS='NORMAL' GROUP BY PAYMENT_TYPE,RECEIPT_TYPE ) OUTER_TABLE

query.title: Employee and Scheme Wise Total Payment and Receipt
query.content: SELECT CONCAT(EMPLOYEE_ID , '-' , SCHEME_ID) EMP_SCHEME, sum(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) TOTAL_PAYMENT, sum(RECEIPT_AMOUNT) TOTAL_RECEIPT FROM ltr_trn_details lts WHERE 1 = 1 AND STATUS='NORMAL' GROUP BY EMP_SCHEME ORDER BY EMP_SCHEME

query.title: Total Transaction
query.content: SELECT SUM(TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) AS TOTAL_LOAN,SUM(TOTAL_RECEIPT_PRINCIPAL) AS TOTAL_PRINCIPAL, SUM(TOTAL_RECEIPT_DONATION) AS TOTAL_DONATION,SUM(TOTAL_PAYMENT_SECURITY_DEPOSITE) AS BSD_PAID, SUM(TOTAL_RECEIPT_SECURITY_DEPOSITE) AS BSD_RECEIPT FROM ltr_trn_summary WHERE STATUS='NORMAL'

query.title: Payment for last three months
query.content: SELECT if(SUM(TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) is null,0,TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) AS :value, CONCAT(MONTHNAME(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)),'/',YEAR(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))) AS :label FROM ltr_trn_summary WHERE START_DATE @LT@ DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND START_DATE @GTEQ@ MONTH(CURDATE()) AND STATUS='NORMAL' UNION SELECT if(SUM(TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) is null,0,TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) AS :value, CONCAT(MONTHNAME(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH)),'/',YEAR(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH))) AS :label FROM ltr_trn_summary WHERE START_DATE @LTEQ@ DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND START_DATE @GTEQ@ DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH) AND STATUS='NORMAL' UNION SELECT if(SUM(TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) is null,0,TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) AS :value, CONCAT(MONTHNAME(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)),'/',YEAR(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH))) AS :labels FROM ltr_trn_summary WHERE START_DATE @LTEQ@ DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH) AND START_DATE @GTEQ@ DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND STATUS='NORMAL'

query.title: Payment for last three years
query.content: SELECT if(SUM(a.TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) is null,0, SUM(a.TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL)) AS :value , year(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START-1,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) as :label, date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) as 'YEAR_END_DATE' FROM ltr_trn_summary as a join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as b WHERE a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START-1,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) AND a.STATUS='NORMAL' group by 1=1 union SELECT if(SUM(a.TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) is null,0, SUM(a.TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL)) AS :value , year(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START-2,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) as :label, date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START-1,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) as 'YEAR_END_DATE' FROM ltr_trn_summary as a join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as b WHERE a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START-2,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START-1,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) AND a.STATUS='NORMAL' group by 1=1 union SELECT if(SUM(a.TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) is null,0, SUM(a.TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL)) AS :value , year(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START-3,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) as :label, date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START-2,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) as 'YEAR_END_DATE' FROM ltr_trn_summary as a join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as b WHERE a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START-3,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START-2,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) AND a.STATUS='NORMAL' group by 1=1

query.title: Scheme Wise Total Receipt
query.content: SELECT SUM(TOTAL_RECEIPT_PRINCIPAL) AS :value, SCHEME_ID AS :label FROM ltr_trn_summary WHERE STATUS='NORMAL' GROUP BY :label

query.title: Scheme Wise Total Dues
query.content: SELECT SUM(TOTAL_RECEIPT_DUE_PRINCIPAL) AS :value, SCHEME_ID AS :label FROM ltr_trn_summary WHERE STATUS='NORMAL' GROUP BY :label

query.title: Top ten Payment locations
query.content: SELECT SUM(a.TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) AS :value, b.LOCATION_ID as :label , concat(c.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY) AS 'DATE_A', concat(c.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY) AS 'DATE_B' FROM ltr_trn_summary AS a RIGHT OUTER JOIN ref_mst_entity AS b ON a.CUSTOMER_ID=b.CUSTOMER_ID join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as c WHERE a.STATUS='NORMAL' and c.ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' and a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(c.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(c.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) GROUP BY :label ORDER BY :value DESC LIMIT 10

query.title: Scheme type wise total loan
query.content: SELECT rms.SCHEME_TYPE AS :label,SUM(ltd.PAYMENT_AMOUNT) AS :value FROM ref_mst_scheme AS rms LEFT OUTER JOIN ltr_trn_details AS ltd ON rms.SCHEME_ID=ltd.SCHEME_ID WHERE ltd.STATUS='NORMAL' GROUP BY :label

query.title: Scheme type wise total loan
query.content: select a.EMPLOYEE_ID as :label, SUM(a.TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) as :value, date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) as 'YEAR_START_DATE', date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) as 'YEAR_END_DATE' from ltr_trn_summary as a join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as b where a.STATUS='NORMAL' and b.ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' and a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) group by a.EMPLOYEE_ID order by :value desc

query.title: Payment recept due of currnet year
query.content: select sum(a.TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) AS :value, 'PAYMENT' as :label, concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY) AS 'DATE_A', concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY) AS 'DATE_B' from ltr_trn_summary as a join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as b where a.STATUS='NORMAL' and b.ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' and a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) group by 1=1 union select sum(a.TOTAL_RECEIPT_PRINCIPAL) AS :value, 'RECEIPT' as :label, concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY) AS 'DATE_A', concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY) AS 'DATE_B' from ltr_trn_summary as a join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as b where a.STATUS='NORMAL' and b.ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' and a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) group by 1=1 union select sum(a.TOTAL_RECEIPT_DUE_PRINCIPAL) AS :value, 'DUE' as :label, concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY) AS 'DATE_A', concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY) AS 'DATE_B' from ltr_trn_summary as a join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as b where a.STATUS='NORMAL' and b.ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' and a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) group by 1=1

query.title: Payment recept due of currnet year
query.content: SELECT rms.SCHEME_TYPE as :label ,SUM(ltd.RECEIPT_AMOUNT) as :value, concat(c.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY) AS 'DATE_A', concat(c.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY) AS 'DATE_B' FROM ref_mst_scheme AS rms LEFT OUTER JOIN ltr_trn_details AS ltd ON rms.SCHEME_ID=ltd.SCHEME_ID join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as c WHERE ltd.STATUS='NORMAL' and c.ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' and ltd.TRANSACTION_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(c.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and ltd.TRANSACTION_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(c.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) GROUP BY :label

query.title: Payment recept due of currnet year
query.content: SELECT SUM(a.TOTAL_RECEIPT_PRINCIPAL) AS :value, b.LOCATION_ID as :label , concat(c.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY) AS 'DATE_A', concat(c.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY) AS 'DATE_B' FROM ltr_trn_summary AS a RIGHT OUTER JOIN ref_mst_entity AS b ON a.CUSTOMER_ID=b.CUSTOMER_ID join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as c WHERE a.STATUS='NORMAL' and c.ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' and a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(c.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(c.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) GROUP BY :label ORDER BY :value DESC LIMIT 10

query.title: Payment and receipt of current week
query.content: select sum(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) as :value, week(current_date) as :label from ltr_trn_details where STATUS='NORMAL' and week(current_date)=week(TRANSACTION_DATE) union select sum(RECEIPT_AMOUNT) as :value, week(current_date) as :label from ltr_trn_details where STATUS='NORMAL' and week(current_date)=week(TRANSACTION_DATE)

query.title: Top ten location with maximum due of current year
query.content: SELECT SUM(a.TOTAL_RECEIPT_DUE_PRINCIPAL) as :value , b.LOCATION_ID as :label , concat(c.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY) AS 'DATE_A', concat(c.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY) AS 'DATE_B' FROM ltr_trn_summary AS a RIGHT OUTER JOIN ref_mst_entity AS b ON a.CUSTOMER_ID=b.CUSTOMER_ID join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as c WHERE a.STATUS='NORMAL' and c.ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' and a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(c.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(c.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) GROUP BY :label ORDER BY :value DESC LIMIT 10

query.title: Month wise payment of current year
query.content: select sum(a.TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) as :value, a.START_DATE,monthname(a.START_DATE) as :label , concat(c.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY) AS 'DATE_A', concat(c.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY) AS 'DATE_B' from ltr_trn_summary as a join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as c where a.STATUS='NORMAL' and c.ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' and a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(c.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(c.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',c.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) group by :label

query.title: Month wise recept of current year
query.content: select sum(a.TOTAL_RECEIPT_PRINCIPAL) as :value, a.START_DATE,monthname(a.START_DATE) as :label, concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY) AS 'DATE_A', concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY) AS 'DATE_B' from ltr_trn_summary as a join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as b where a.STATUS='NORMAL' and b.ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' and a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) group by :label

query.title: Top five Collector with maximum recept
query.content: select a.EMPLOYEE_ID as :label, sum(a.TOTAL_RECEIPT_PRINCIPAL) as :value , concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY) AS 'DATE_A', concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY) AS 'DATE_B' from ltr_trn_summary as a join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as b where a.STATUS='NORMAL' and b.ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' and a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) group by :label order by :value desc limit 5

query.title: Project wise during the year total payment
query.content: select a.SCHEME_ID as :label, sum(a.TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) as :value , concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY) AS 'DATE_A', concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY) AS 'DATE_B' from ltr_trn_summary as a join ( SELECT * FROM ref_mst_fin_year_info WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' AND STATUS='NORMAL') as b where a.STATUS='NORMAL' and b.ACTIVE_STATUS='ACTIVE' and a.START_DATE@GTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_START,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_START_DAY)) and a.START_DATE@LTEQ@date(concat(b.FIN_YEAR_END,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_MONTH,'-',b.FIN_YEAR_END_DAY)) group by :label order by :value desc

query.title: last month project wise payment
query.content: select SCHEME_ID as :label, sum(TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) as :value from ltr_trn_summary where STATUS='NORMAL' and month(START_DATE)=month(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) group by :label order by :value

query.title: last month project wise payment
query.content: select EMPLOYEE_ID as :label, sum(TOTAL_PAYMENT_PRINCIPAL) as :value from ltr_trn_summary where STATUS='NORMAL' and month(START_DATE)=month(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) group by :label order by :value

query.title: last month collector wise receipt
query.content: select EMPLOYEE_ID as :label, sum(TOTAL_RECEIPT_PRINCIPAL) as :value from ltr_trn_summary where STATUS='NORMAL' and month(START_DATE)=month(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) group by :label order by :value

query.title: last month project wise receipt
query.content: select SCHEME_ID as :label, sum(TOTAL_RECEIPT_PRINCIPAL) as :value from ltr_trn_summary where STATUS='NORMAL' and month(START_DATE)=month(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) group by :label order by :value
